title: Occupation of Paterdomus

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Occupation of Paterdomus is a conflict occurring in year 169 of the Fifth Age. The conflict occurred after attacking Monks of Zamorak stormed the Saradominist temple of Paterdomus, which lies on the border of Misthalin and Morytania, in a narrow mountain-pass called Silvarea.

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Occupation of Paterdomus
Occupation of Paterdomus
Date 169 Fifth Age
Conflict Sanguinesti Liberation War
Place Paterdomus, eastern Misthalin
Outcome Decisive Zamorakian victory
Combatants
Saradominist Order of Paterdomus Rogue Zamorakian insurgents
Commanders
Unknown Unknown
Strength
Unknown Unknown
Casualties
99% or more; two known survivors Light

The Occupation of Paterdomus is a conflict occurring in year 169 of the Fifth Age. The conflict occurred after attacking Monks of Zamorak stormed the Saradominist temple of Paterdomus, which lies on the border of Misthalin and Morytania, in a narrow mountain-pass called Silvarea.

The Zamorakians broke through the doors and killed the majority of the Temple's residents. Drezel, the only known Saradominist survivor, was imprisoned in the upper levels of the building,[1] next to a coffin containing a vampyre that the Zamorakians had brought.[2] Two other members of the order, Ulizius and Hiylik Myna, were away on business at the time of the attack.

Following the battle, the Zamorakians took up residence in the Temple. The Zamorakians aimed to desecrate the River Salve in order to weaken the river's blessing[3] and allow for the armies of Morytania to invade Misthalin.[4]

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Drezel, "Priest in Peril", Old School RuneScape. "those Zamorakians attacked this place and imprisoned me up here."
  2. ^ Drezel, "Priest in Peril", Old School RuneScape. "This coffin here contains one of those vampyres. The Zamorakians somehow found it and brought it here with them."
  3. ^ Drezel, "Priest in Peril", Old School RuneScape. "I fear this group of Zamorakians intends to take advantage of that. If they can somehow pollute the Salve, the blessings on the river might fail."
  4. ^ Drezel, "Priest in Peril", Old School RuneScape. "If that happens, there won't be anything to stop an invasion from Morytania."

The '''Occupation of Paterdomus''' is a conflict occurring in year 169 of the [[Fifth Age]]. The conflict occurred after attacking [[Monks of Zamorak]] stormed the [[Saradominist]] temple of [[Paterdomus]], which lies on the border of [[Misthalin]] and [[Morytania]], in a narrow mountain-pass called [[Silvarea]].

The [[Zamorak]]ians broke through the doors and killed the majority of the Temple's residents. Drezel, the only known Saradominist survivor, was imprisoned in the upper levels of the building,{{CiteNPC|npc=Drezel|loc=Priest in Peril|quote=those Zamorakians attacked this place and imprisoned me up here.}} next to a coffin containing a [[vampyre]] that the Zamorakians had brought.{{CiteNPC|npc=Drezel|loc=Priest in Peril|quote=This coffin here contains one of those vampyres. The Zamorakians somehow found it and brought it here with them.}} Two other members of the order, [[Ulizius]] and [[Hiylik Myna]], were away on business at the time of the attack.

Following the battle, the Zamorakians took up residence in the Temple. The Zamorakians aimed to desecrate the [[River Salve]] in order to weaken the river's blessing{{CiteNPC|npc=Drezel|loc=Priest in Peril|quote=I fear this group of Zamorakians intends to take advantage of that. If they can somehow pollute the Salve, the blessings on the river might fail.}} and allow for the armies of Morytania to invade Misthalin.{{CiteNPC|npc=Drezel|loc=Priest in Peril|quote=If that happens, there won't be anything to stop an invasion from Morytania.}}
